Title: Includes in false registration the attempt to register as an elector knowing that they are not qualified due to lack of U.S. citizenship
Summary: Includes attempting to register as an elector knowing that they are not qualified due to lack of U.S. citizenship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to including attempting to register as an elector knowing that they are not qualified due to lack of U.S. citizenship
